sections.title: Error BEDAISY.SYS
sections.text: Launch Klar before opening the game, not while it’s running.

sections.title: Error L2
sections.text: Uninstall Faceit and Vanguard, disable antivirus, and turn off Core Isolation.

sections.title: Error L2 -(1073741637)
sections.text:
1. Go to Settings > Security > Device Security.
2. Turn off Memory Integrity.
3. Restart PC and verify it’s off.
4. Start the loader.

sections.title: Error L2 -(1073741670)
sections.text: Uninstall FACEIT AC from your PC.

sections.title: Error M1 | DEBUG ERROR 2
sections.text: Temporary fix: Restart PC per injection. Permanent fix: Reinstall Windows to PRO version.

sections.title: Error Loader Closing at 100%
sections.text: Go to Windows Settings > Date and Time > 'Sync Now', then reinject Klar.

sections.title: Error Loader Shows Banned
sections.text: Restart PC and retry after 2 hours.

sections.title: Error BSOD
sections.text: Run as admin in CMD: `sfc /scannow`, then `DISM.exe /Online /Cleanup-image /Restorehealth`. Restart PC and reinject.

sections.title: Error 0xc0000142
sections.text: Caused by Windows Insider—reinstall to normal Windows version.
